Frequently Asked Questions

What is BalanceBeam?

BalanceBeam is an AI-powered bookkeeping agent that automatically handles financial tasks for freelancers and small businesses.

How does it automate bookkeeping?

BalanceBeam connects to your bank accounts and accounting tools, then uses AI to categorize transactions, reconcile accounts, generate reports, manage payroll, and more.

Is my financial data secure?

Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and adhere to industry best practices to keep your data safe.

How much does it cost?

We offer simple, transparent pricing. Start for free, then upgrade as your business grows.
